text:
Description: Implement `grove dashboard` command with embedded SvelteKit frontend.

From spec section 12.4 and Web Dashboard Tech Stack:

**Go Backend** (cli/internal/dashboard/):
- server.go: HTTP server serving embedded static files
- websocket.go: Real-time workspace/agent updates
- api.go: REST endpoints (/api/workspaces, /api/agents)
- embed.go: //go:embed web/build/*

**SvelteKit Frontend** (cli/web/):
- +page.svelte: Main dashboard
- agents/+page.svelte: Agent monitoring
- review/+page.svelte: Review queue
- WebSocket store for real-time reactivity
- Tailwind CSS for styling

**Features**:
- Real-time status updates via WebSocket
- Side-by-side browser frames for comparing branches
- Diff viewer with syntax highlighting
- Activity timeline per workspace

**Build**:
- `npm run build` in web/ produces static files
- Go embeds files with //go:embed
- Single binary output
Close reason: Implemented all Phase 4b features: grove review, grove cycle, and grove dashboard with SvelteKit web UI
